characterList: 南門們閒問間簡開聞倉槍創非排罪靠侯候決快筷韋圍偉

characters.story: This character represents south, asking "Nahn? Direction?" curiously!
The gate takes the shape of gate, asking "Muhn? Entrance?" curiously!
Plural marker gate person says "men" neutrally - we/they/you all!
The tree and gate unite to create leisure, asking "Shyan? Idle?" curiously!
The gate and mouth unite to create to ask, shouting "Wuhn!" sharply!
Picture a gate beside a sun: that's interval, singing "Jyan!" cheerfully!
See how the bamboo forms simple? It whispers "Jyan" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The gate takes the shape of to open, singing "Kigh!" cheerfully!
"Wuhn, are you sniffing?" The ear at the gate questioned hearing curiously - listening!
The mouth takes the shape of storehouse, singing "Tsahng!" cheerfully!
See how the tree forms gun? It sings "Chyahng!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The sword takes the shape of to initiate, shouting "Chwahng!" sharply!
The strokes unite to show non—, singing "Fay!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
When the line meets the hand, they form row, asking "Pigh? Line?" curiously!
This character represents guilt, shouting "Dzway!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for to lean on that shouts "Cow!" sharply!
With an arrow combined with a target, you get marquis - "Ho? Lord?" rings out curiously!
"Ho!" The marquis walking commanded sharply to wait - expecting the climate!
"Jyueh, what are we determining?" Water and husband questioned deciding curiously!
Like a heart, this character means fast and shouts "Kwigh!"!
See how the bamboo forms chopsticks? It shouts "Kwigh!" sharply!
"Way, is this skin?" The soft leather questioned tanned hide curiously - processed!
"Way, should we circle it?" The hide in an enclosure questioned surrounding curiously - corralling!
See how the person forms great? It whispers "Way" softly - a vivid image to remember!
